meanings.definition: Of or relating to a type of volcanic rock.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the trappean rocks found near the volcano.
meanings.sent2: The hiker marveled at the trappean formations along the mountain trail.
meanings.sent3: The trappean rocks seemed to whisper secrets to the curious geologist.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as solid as trappean rock, unwavering in the face of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The trappean landscape painted a picture of ancient volcanic activity.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a trap.
meanings.sent1: The trappean door slammed shut behind him, sealing his fate.
meanings.sent2: The trappean design of the maze confused the adventurous explorers.
meanings.sent3: The trappean puzzle was so tricky that even the clever fox got caught.
meanings.sent4: Her words were a trappean web, ensnaring all who dared to listen.
meanings.sent5: The trappean nature of the situation made escape seem impossible.
